methodology.description: For each promise, search for SUPPORTING laws (would help achieve promise) and CONTRADICTING laws (would hurt/prevent promise). Check Somos Peru voting record on each.
methodology.ampay_threshold: >=60% NO votes on supporting laws OR >=60% SI votes on contradicting laws
